groups.name: dailogi.e2e-test.user
groups.description: Configuration properties for E2E test user.

groups.name: openrouter.encryption
groups.description: Configuration properties for API key encryption.

groups.name: openrouter.api
groups.description: Configuration properties for OpenRouter API integration.

properties.name: dailogi.user.limits.max-characters-per-user
properties.description: Maximum number of characters a user can create.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens.

properties.name: jwt.expiration-ms
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT tokens in milliseconds.

properties.name: dailogi.e2e-test.user.name
properties.description: Username for the E2E test user.

properties.name: dailogi.e2e-test.user.password
properties.description: Password for the E2E test user.

properties.name: openrouter.encryption.key
properties.description: The encryption key used for API key encryption/decryption.

properties.name: openrouter.encryption.iv-length
properties.description: GCM initialization vector length in bytes.

properties.name: openrouter.api.base-url
properties.description: Base URL for the OpenRouter API.

properties.name: openrouter.api.connect-timeout
properties.description: Connect timeout for the OpenRouter API client.

properties.name: openrouter.api.read-timeout
properties.description: Read timeout for the OpenRouter API client.

properties.name: openrouter.api.mock-enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable mocking OpenRouter API responses.
